installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
rm -rf /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y install wget unzip ffmpeg
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
chown -R root:root /mnt
cd /mnt/server/
wget https://github.com/sprrnetwrk/bottemplate/archive/master.zip
unzip master
rm -rf master.zip
